title: Prime Commercial Property In Palapathwala Town, Matale
details:
Inviting business community of Matale, Palapathwala, Dambulla or from other areas for a prudent investment in Palapathwala town, along A9 Kandy-Jaffna highway, almost half-way between Matale and Dambulla BUSINESS HUBS.
A 300p prime commercial land within 500m from town is available for quick sale. Good investment for a supply chain store, office, warehouse, factory or a boutique hotel etc. Readily-buildable land with 3-phase electricity, ground water, container accessibility.
